system.Text:
When **you retire from your life as Ironsworn**, envision two things: What you hope for, and what you fear. Then, roll the challenge dice and compare to your bonds. Momentum is ignored on this roll.

On a **strong hit**, things come to pass as you hoped.

On a **weak hit**, your life takes an unexpected turn, but not necessarily for the worse. You find yourself spending your days with someone or in a place you did not foresee. Envision it (@Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure).

On a **miss**, your fears are realized.

Trigger.Text: When you retire from your life as Ironsworn...

Strong Hit.Text: Things come to pass as you had hoped.

Weak Hit.Text: Your life takes an unexpected turn, but not necessarily for the worse. You find yourself spending your days with someone or in a place you did not foresee. Envision it (@Compendium[foundry-supersworn.ironswornmoves.aba3e44b7e810c0f]{Ask the Oracle} if unsure).
